original_text:
In the womb he grasped his brother’s heel;
    as a man he struggled with God.
korean_text: 야곱은 모태에서 그의 형의 발뒤꿈치를 잡았고 또 힘으로는 하나님과 겨루되

sentences.original_text: In the womb he grasped his brother's heel;
sentences.korean_translation: 태어날 때 그는 형의 발뒤꿈치를 잡았으며

sentences.original_text: as a man he struggled with God.
